EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.Intelligent.Services.N.G.N.18224.TBC (Nurture 3).Email 2A /3B
EmailTemplate.subject: Take control of your network rollout
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Talk to our experts Find out how our expertise takes the pain out of your network rollout Network migration projects raise many challenges. But don’t worry – you’re not alone.
Book a meeting today with one of our experts to discuss how our services <[[https://pages.nokia.com/16121.nokia.services.expert.LP.html]]> remove the complexity from your network rollout. While we take the strain of enhancing capacity and reducing costs, you can focus on what you do best – delighting your customers. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
